\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\lhead{Alex Hagen}


\chead{QE Studying: Thermal Hydraulics Solutions}


\rhead{1/12/15}


\cfoot{\thepage\ of \pageref{LastPage}}


\title{Non-Dimensional Parameters \cite{Bird2007}}

\maketitle
\begin{center}
\begin{table}[H]
\protect\caption{Non-Dimensional Parameters Important in Nuclear Thermal Hydraulics}


~

\centering{}%
\begin{tabular}{ccc>{\centering}p{5cm}}
\hline 
Symbol & Name & Formula & Physical Meaning\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
\hline 
$Re$ & Reynold's & $\frac{\rho vD}{\mu}$ & $\frac{\text{inertial force}}{\text{viscous force}}$\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Pr$ & Prandtl & $\frac{\nu}{\alpha}=\frac{c_{p}\mu}{k}$ & --\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Gr$ & Grashof & $\frac{g\beta\Delta TD^{3}}{\nu^{2}}$ & --\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Br$ & Brinkman & $\frac{\mu v^{2}}{k\Delta T}$ & $\frac{\text{heat production by viscous dissipation}}{\text{heat transport by conduction}}$\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Pe$ & Peclet & $RePr$ & $\frac{\text{convection heat transport}}{\text{conduction heat transport}}$\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Ra$ & Rayleigh & $GrPr$ & --\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Ec$ & Eckert & $\frac{Br}{Pr}$ & --\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Fr$ & Froude & $\frac{\rho v}{pgD}$ & $\frac{\text{inertial force}}{\text{gravitational force}}$\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
-- & -- & $\frac{Gr}{Re^{2}}$ & $\frac{\text{buoyant force}}{\text{inertial force}}$\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Ma$ & Mach & $\frac{v}{c}$ & --\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Nu$ & Nusselt & $\frac{hD}{k}$ & $\frac{\text{convection}}{\text{conduction}}$%
\footnote{from solid to liquid%
}\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$We$ & Weber & $\frac{Dv^{2}\rho}{\sigma}$ & $\frac{\text{inertial force}}{\text{surface tension}}$\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
$Bi$ & Biot & $\frac{hD}{k}$ & $\frac{\text{convection}}{\text{conduction}}$%
\footnote{in solid body%
}\tabularnewline[0.2cm]
\hline 
\end{tabular}
\end{table}

\par\end{center}
